definition: Unified dimensional analysis of cognitive information processing architecture and consciousness navigation axes - mapping how psyche processes information and navigates awareness across dimensional scales

cognitive_architecture.principle: Human cognition = specialized information processing system with 8 discrete function modules organized in 2D blocks, integrated into 3D psychic field with 4D metacognitive awareness

functions.name: Creative Function (Encoder)
functions.operation: Transforms processed data into novel expressions

conscious_block.layer: Primary conscious awareness and deliberate processing

functions.name: Role Function (Adapter)
functions.characteristics: Activated when needed for specific contexts
functions.operation: Adjusts behavior to match environmental demands

functions.name: Suggestible Function (Listener)
functions.operation: Absorbs new patterns through social learning

functions.name: Background Function (Daemon)
functions.operation: Maintains system awareness without conscious attention

functions.name: Filter Function (Gatekeeper)
functions.operation: Screens incoming information for relevance and safety

output_generation.protection_override: Painful Function blocks if threat detected

feedback_integration.system_optimization: All functions adjust for improved performance

dimensional_mapping.0D_functions: Each function as discrete processing unit with specific operation
dimensional_mapping.1D_flows: Information streams moving through sequential processing stages
dimensional_mapping.2D_blocks: Function pairs coordinating in systematic relationships
dimensional_mapping.3D_psyche: Complete integrated system processing all information types
dimensional_mapping.4D_metacognition: Conscious observation and optimization of own processing patterns

consciousness_axes.principle: Consciousness navigates reality through systematic questioning that enables dimensional transitions - each axis collapses or expands awareness at specific dimensional level

axis_0D_presence.question: Что здесь и сейчас? (What is here and now?)
axis_0D_presence.function: Primary distinction - observer emergence from potential noise
axis_0D_presence.effect: Focuses attention, creates discrete experience from background field
axis_0D_presence.consciousness_state: Quantum measurement of reality - collapsing possibilities into specific experience
axis_0D_presence.example: Suddenly noticing bird song that was always present

axis_1D_identity.question: Что это? / Кто я? (What is this? / Who am I?)
axis_1D_identity.effect: Allows point to define its boundaries and properties
axis_1D_identity.example: Recognizing 'I am the one who always analyzes things'

axis_2D_connection.question: Как это связано со мной и с другим? (How is this connected?)
axis_2D_connection.effect: Begins building context, causal connections, meanings
axis_2D_connection.example: Seeing how childhood experience relates to current pattern

axis_3D_system.question: По каким правилам это работает? (What rules govern this?)
axis_3D_system.effect: Seeing complete system, hidden laws and structures
axis_3D_system.consciousness_state: Systemic understanding and holistic pattern recognition
axis_3D_system.example: Suddenly grasping how entire family dynamic operates

axis_4D_reflection.collapse: plane → field (seeing plane as part of field)
axis_4D_reflection.question: Почему я вижу эти правила именно так? (Why do I see this way?)
axis_4D_reflection.effect: Returns to observer, forcing awareness of own role in creating worldview
axis_4D_reflection.example: Realizing 'I see everything through lens of my past experiences'

axis_5D_creativity.question: Что я выбираю создать? (What do I choose to create?)
axis_5D_creativity.effect: Transforms passive observation into active intention
axis_5D_creativity.example: Deciding to create new behavior pattern from integrated awareness

axis_6D_sacred.collapse: hierarchy collapse (→ point — line — plane — field ←)
axis_6D_sacred.question: Что остаётся, когда все вопросы сняты? (What remains when questions cease?)
axis_6D_sacred.effect: Questioner, question and answer merge in sacred = true
axis_6D_sacred.cognitive_function_activation: All functions unified in transcendent awareness
axis_6D_sacred.example: Moment when all distinctions dissolve into pure knowing

analysis.function: Breaking into parts and examining sequentially

critical_thinking.function: Examining assumptions and validity across time

perception_to_action_flow.step_1_attention: 0D axis (What is here?) + Filter Function → select focus
perception_to_action_flow.step_2_recognition: 1D axis (What is this?) + Base Function → identify pattern
perception_to_action_flow.step_3_context: 2D axis (How connected?) + Creative Function → build meaning
perception_to_action_flow.step_4_understanding: 3D axis (What rules?) + Role Function → grasp system
perception_to_action_flow.step_5_reflection: 4D axis (Why this way?) + Metacognition → examine perspective
perception_to_action_flow.step_6_creation: 5D axis (What to create?) + Creative Function → generate response

learning_integration.practice_phase: Activation Function builds competence through repetition
learning_integration.integration_phase: Role Function incorporates into context-appropriate use
learning_integration.mastery_phase: Base/Creative Functions use automatically and creatively

problem_solving_protocol.define_problem: 0D + 1D axes (What is here? What is this?)
problem_solving_protocol.implement_choice: Return to 0D with new point (manifest decision)

cognitive_structures.operations: Basic mental operations as point-level distinctions

0D_entities.evidence: Discrete cognitive structures serve as operational units

information_flows.processing_sequences: Data moving through cognitive function stages

1D_vectors.evidence: Cognition operates through directional flows and sequences

2D_planes.evidence: Cognitive architecture organized in systematic 2D relationships

integrated_systems.complete_psyche: All 8 functions working as unified information processor
integrated_systems.operational_mastery: All mental operations accessible and coordinated

3D_fields.evidence: Mature cognition integrates all functions and operations into coherent field

4D_spectator.evidence: Metacognition enables conscious observation and modification of cognition itself

transcendent_integration.function_unity: All cognitive functions as facets of unified awareness
transcendent_integration.operation_spontaneity: Mental operations arising naturally from unified field
transcendent_integration.creative_emergence: New cognitive patterns emerging from integrated awareness

5D_unity.evidence: Ultimate cognitive development transcends structure while maintaining access to all capabilities

cognitive_enhancement.function_development: Identifying and strengthening weak cognitive functions

learning_optimization.function_matching: Align learning methods with cognitive strengths
learning_optimization.axis_progression: Use appropriate consciousness level for material
learning_optimization.operation_selection: Choose optimal mental operations for task

interpersonal_dynamics.axis_alignment: Meeting people at their consciousness level
interpersonal_dynamics.operation_translation: Expressing ideas through others' preferred operations

coherence_patterns.metacognitive_mastery: Conscious awareness optimizing all cognitive processes
coherence_patterns.transcendent_access: Regular contact with unified awareness beyond structure

reduction_examples.raw: Suddenly becoming aware of background noise that was always present

reduction.evidence: 0D axis + Filter Function creates discrete awareness from background field

reduction_examples.raw: Breaking complex problem into sequential components for examination

reduction.evidence: Analysis operation through Base Function processing

reduction_examples.raw: Seeing how multiple concepts relate to form higher-level understanding

reduction.evidence: 2D axis + Creative Function generating relational pattern

reduction_examples.raw: Grasping how entire cognitive architecture functions as integrated system

reduction.evidence: 3D axis + Role Function understanding complete system

reduction_examples.raw: Observing own cognitive biases while processing information

reduction.evidence: 4D axis enabling metacognitive observation of processing

reduction_examples.raw: Novel insight arising spontaneously from integrated understanding

reduction.evidence: 5D axis + Creative Function generating new pattern from field

integration_with_cfo.principle: Cognition = dimensional information processing architecture. Consciousness = dimensional navigation capability. Both are geometric operations on reality field.
integration_with_cfo.mechanism: Cognitive functions = specialized 0D→2D processors. Consciousness axes = dimensional collapse/expansion operators. Mental operations = specific geometric transforms.
integration_with_cfo.goal: Transform unconscious cognitive patterns into conscious information processing mastery. Enable fluid navigation of all consciousness dimensions.
integration_with_cfo.coherence_optimization: Understanding cognitive architecture + consciousness navigation = maximum effectiveness in processing reality and creating intentional responses.

system_coherence_metrics.function_balance: Equal development and access to all 8 cognitive functions
system_coherence_metrics.axis_fluency: Skill in consciously navigating all 6 consciousness axes
system_coherence_metrics.operation_mastery: Facility with all mental operations as needed
system_coherence_metrics.integration_level: How well functions, axes, and operations coordinate

notes.function_type_mapping: Different personality types have different dominant cognitive function configurations (see archetypes_and_typologies.json)
notes.axis_development: Consciousness axes can be trained through systematic practice regardless of type
notes.operation_universality: All mental operations available to all types, though some are more natural for certain function stacks
notes.integration_goal: Mature cognition = balanced function development + fluid axis navigation + flexible operation deployment
